settings.heading: What Is Included
settings.content:
• Warrior water chiller
  • Hose connectors/attachments (1/2 female and male fittings)
  • Hoses from the chiller to the ice bath
  • External water filter
  • External water pump
  • Standard US power cord

settings.heading: PRO vs Standard Comparison
settings.content:
The main difference is that the PRO chiller is more powerful & cools 2x faster. The PRO is a must if you live in a warm climate area with temperatures above 77°F / (25°C).

PRO Chiller (1/2 hp):

  • Perfect for hotter climates (above 77 °F / 25 °C).
  • Enhanced cooling performance, lowering water temperature to an invigorating 39 F - 42 F
  • Consistent water temperature
  • Rapid water cooling
  • Weighs 48 lbs (22 kg) with an increased 1200W cooling power, while maintaining easy setup and portability.
  • Superior durability to withstand the demands of high-performance usage.
  • Low noise operation
  • User-friendly controls for temperature adjustments.
  • Portable and easy to set up

Standard Chiller (1/3 hp):

  • Designed for medium to low-temperature climates.
  • Can cool water down to 50 - 60 °F
  • Weighs 37lbs (17 kg) with 600W cooling power.
  • Consistent water temperature maintenance.
  • User-friendly controls for temperature adjustments.
  • Low noise operation
  • Portable and easy to set up

settings.heading: Specifications
settings.content:
Pro - 1/2 HP Water Chiller:

  • Water pump flow rate: 211 gallons per hour
  • Power: Ultra-efficient 1/2 HP compressor, consuming 1200W for optimal energy savings. Voltage - Standard US 110V/60hz.
  • Temperature: Can cool water to 39 - 42 °F
  • Dimensions: Measuring 13x13x15in / (34x34x37cm), our chiller is designed for effortless mobility and placement.
  • Coating: Matte black corrosion resistant paint on a steel box & frame.
  • Indoor/Outdoor use: The water chiller can be used outdoors, but we recommend covering it, so it doesn't get dirt or water on it because it is not waterproof.

Standard - 1/3 HP Water Chiller:

  • Water pump flow rate: 211 gallons per hour
  • Power: Energy-efficient 1/3 HP compressor, consuming only 600W for optimal energy savings. Voltage - Standard US 110V/60hz.
  • Temperature: Can cool water to 50 - 60 °F
  • Dimensions: Measuring 12x12x13in / (29x29x32cm), our chiller is designed for effortless mobility and placement.
  • Coating: Matte black corrosion resistant paint on a steel box & frame.
  • Indoor/Outdoor use: The water chiller can be used outdoors, but we recommend covering it, so it doesn't get dirt or water on it because it is not waterproof.

Example of power usage: The water chiller won't hike up your energy bill. It uses the same technology and compressor your fridge/freezer at home uses, which is super economical.

settings.heading: Shipping and Returns
settings.content:
Shipping is FREE to the US in 2 - 6 business days.

Shipping to Canada and Hawaii takes between 7 - 14 business days.

Returns: Should the Warrior Water Chiller not meet your expectations, you can return it within 60 days for a refund.

settings.heading: Warranty
settings.content:
Your satisfaction is our priority. If you are not happy with the product, we will take it back and refund you.

We stand behind the integrity of our products and offer a 1-year warranty. In case of malfunction issues, you will receive a free replacement. Additionally, we provide 24/7 customer support, ready to assist you via email, live chat, and SMS.

settings.title: 60 DAY MONEY BACK GUARANTEE
settings.text: If our products do not redefine your recovery routine, we will refund you. No questions asked.

settings.title: 1 YEAR WARRANTY
settings.text: We stand behind the integrity of our products and offer a warranty for one year. You get full support even outside the warranty period.

settings.title: FREE INSURED SHIPPING & 24/7 CUSTOMER SUPPORT
settings.text: Free shipping and the best in class customer support team, ready to help you via email, live chat and SMS/Text.
